traits.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aerosaur is flying and dives at least 30 feet toward a target and then hits with a bite attack, the attack deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to the target.

traits.name: Flyby
entries: The aerosaur doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 12 (3d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
